name: Arapuca
description:
A puzzle game for mega drive with an astonishing mode7 rotation.

This is a rom file, you will need an emulator (such Kega Fusion or Retroarch) or an flash cart to play the game.

code: Laudelino "nemezes"

art: Paulo "amaweks" Villalva
music: Casemiro Azevedo
tests and help: Luiz Villalva
